description: When upgrading from Windows 7 to Windows 10, the cloud-based activation key allows for continued activation on the same system, even after reinstallation. This feature is automatically created during the initial upgrade process, ensuring that users can reinstall the operating system without losing their activation status. It simplifies the transition for organizations migrating their systems to Windows 10 and reduces the administrative overhead of tracking activation keys. By leveraging this cloud-based mechanism, admins can enhance user experience and streamline support related to OS activation without additional manual configurations. Understanding this process is crucial for effective patch management and system administration during upgrades.
